description.en: Filter a table (e.g. CSV) by attribute. Only keep those rows of the table that match all the conditions. You can give conditions for several columns.

csv_url.title: Input table (by URL)
csv_url.description: URL of the input table to be filtered. Please pass a URL.

keep.title: Attribute values to keep (by equality)
keep.description: JSON dictionary of the form 'attribute-name': [list of attribute values], e.g.'species':['species1', 'species2'].

conditions.title: Numerical conditions (<, >, <=, >=, ==)
conditions.description: JSON dictionary of the form 'attribute-name': 'condition', e.g. 'latitude': 'x>=20' or 'concentration': '30<x<40'.

comment.title: Comment
comment.description: Arbitrary string that will not be processed but returned, for user's convenience.

filtered_data.title: Filtered data
filtered_data.description: The input list, but without the items whose values for the given attributes do not fall into the given list.
